databaseInterface
Class MainRun

java.lang.Object
  databaseInterface.MainRun

public class MainRun
extends java.lang.Object

MainRun Starts the program and contains the list of entries, and methods to operate on the list.

Version:
Beta 1.0 2011 (First release), Beta 1.0.1 2011 (Correct display problems added remove entry onto search return, and fixed a bug that crashed the createParagraph() method)
Author:
Stephen Nusko

getEntryData

public static SortedList getEntryData()
getEntryData returns the SortedList that stores all the entry data.

Returns:
Returns a SortedList with the current Data that was loaded at program start up.

public static void addEntryData(EntryNode input)
AddEntryData will add and then save the list to object.bin

Parameters:
input - Used to pass the entryNode to enter into the SortedList.

entryDataLength

public static int entryDataLength()
entryDataLength will retrive the length of the data list.

Returns:
returns an int equal to the number of items on the list.

resetEntryData

ResetEntryData will reset the list to its original condition.

isEmpty

public static boolean isEmpty()
isEmpty checks if the list has any data in it.

Returns:
returns a boolean true if empty false otherwise.

pictureID

public static long pictureID()
PictureID is used to get a currently unused number for use as a picture ID

Returns:
returns a long one more then the last time called.

deleteEntryNode

public static void deleteEntryNode(EntryNode input)
deleteEntryNode will find the EntryNode deleteing all pictures from the hard drive then removes it from the list

Parameters:
input - Removes the EntryNode object passed from the list, as well as any files saves with it.

removeEntryNode

public static void removeEntryNode(EntryNode input)
removeEntryNode is used when a full delete of photos is unneeded or harmful

Parameters:
input - Removes the EntryNode object passed from the list, leaving any files intact.

deletePicture

public static void deletePicture(EntryNode input1,
                                 PictureNode input2)
deletePicture will delete the selected picture from the hard drive and the entryNode and saves the results to objects.bin

Parameters:
input1 - The EntryNode containing the photo to be deleted.
input2 - The PictureNode to be deleted.

findNode

public static EntryNode findNode(EntryNode input)
findNode checks to see if the EntryNode is there and then returns it if true.

Parameters:
input - the entryNode to be looked for.
Returns:
Returns an EntryNode if true otherwise will return null.

Parameters:

Returns:

Parameters:

Returns:
